issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: MR job client cannot reconnect to AM after NM restart.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Total resource count mistake:
NodeRemovedSchedulerEvent in ReconnectNodeTransition will reduce the newNode.getTotalCapability() in Multi-thread model. Since the RMNode and scheduler in different queue. So it cannot guarantee the remove-update-add operation in sequence. Sometimes the total resource will reduce the newNode.getTotalCapability() when handling NodeRemovedSchedulerEvent.
fields.summary: Total resource count mistake:NodeRemovedSchedulerEvent in ReconnectNodeTransition will reduce the newNode.getTotalCapability() in Multi-thread model

comments.body: A appropriate way to handle this issue. Just remove the if logic.
A appropriate way to solve the issue. Just remove the 'if' logic.
